item.description:
Hello World,

This is my first suggested outing to the group, so please be kind.

The tall ships are coming to Boston from June 30th to July 6th to celebrate the bicentennial War of 1812. This should be a fun event for both family and friends.

Let's plan on meeting at:

Flour Bakery + Cafe

12 Farnsworth St,

Boston, MA 02210

( http://www.flourbakery.com/ )

 

It's going to be a hot day. So, we'll first grab a drink/sandwhich from there before making our way to the Seaport World Trade Center for the highlight of the day. As a note, parking will probably be hellish there. So, I would highly recommend taking the Red Line train to the South Station T stop. The Flour Bakery + Cafe is only a few minutes walk away from the T stop. Hope to see you there. Thanks.

(p.s. for event details, please visit http://www.opsailboston.com/)

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Sail Boston 2012
